Name: Al Omor Group
description:
Ramza is the featured borrower of Al Omor group which consists of three Syrian refugees.

She gets along with other group members because they trust and respect each other to acquire a Syrian refugee loan together from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua. They’re working hard in order to improve their families’ living conditions and businesses.

Ramza is a 37-year-old married mother of two. She works as a daily laborer in the agriculture field with a limited monthly salary. She works hand by hand with her husband to provide their children with a better living.

Her loan share will be used to pay the rent expenses for a land where she will benefit from its productivity.

Ramza is the lady at the right-side. As for other group members, Ibtisam is the lady in the middle and Amani is the lady at the left-side of the picture.
